summary: This document contains an email exchange involving Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a research grant proposal from a female physicist. The proposal seeks funding for research on novel quantum theories of gravity, highlighting a new approach to the relationship between matter and geometry. The email indicates a personal connection between Staley and Epstein, as well as a discussion about academic support.

persons.name: Jes Staley

persons.name: Alexa N. Staley
persons.context: Alexa N. Staley is included in the email exchange and responds positively to the research proposal discussed.

keyFacts: The email discusses a research grant proposal for $70K to support a year of research at MIT.
The proposal is from a top female physicist in the U.S. focusing on novel quantum theories of gravity.
Jes Staley refers to Alexa N. Staley as 'Dad', indicating a close personal relationship.
Jeffrey Epstein is considering the grant request and is involved in the academic discussion.
The email contains confidentiality disclaimers and legal notices typical of corporate communications.
